item.title: The UN human rights report on Belarus is worrying, but there is precious little the UN can do
item.author: Adrian Liberto
item.description: The Special Rapporteur on the human rights situation in Belarus, Ana√Øs Marin, issued her annual report on June 29, which paints a dire picture of tightening legislation and diminishing civil and political rights.
